welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lake Grove, a charming city known for its stunning lakeside views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover our hidden gems, and we hope you enjoy your stay in our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and duty-free shopping.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private jets, the private terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
